Его мечта сбылось он стал знаменитым барабанщиком. Шухрат работает артистом в театре «Кохи Рудаки» города Худжанда. Он играет на разных инструментах как доира, таблак, кулабек. Его виртуозная игра очень нравится зрителям. Для того чтобы разнообразить свою программу он хочет приобрести инструмент Конго.

loans.use: На покупку музыкального инструмента Конго.

loans.name: Firuzahon

texts.ru: Фирузахон Палванова проживате в районе Руми. Возраст 22 года. Замужем, имеет 2 детей. Фирузахон имеет торговую точку на рынке "Баракат", где торгует овощами.  Этим видом бизнеса занимается более 2 лет. Кредит просит для увеличения товараоборота.
texts.en:
Firuzahon P. is 22-years-old, lives in Rumi District, and is married with 2 children. She has been selling vegetables from the stall she has at the Barakat market for the past 2 years. She is seeking a loan to increase sales.

Translated from Russian by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase her sales.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Дадобой

texts.ru: Дадоджон, мужчина торгует на рынке Панчшанбе рисом. Товар он закупает у дехканов. Период кредитования он увеличил товарооборот и у него стало много покупателей. Его рис закупают не только жители но и повара ресторанов и столовых. На запрашиваемый займ он хочет закупить несколько мешков риса.

loans.use: На закупку риса

loans.name: Alkosti

texts.ru: Алкости Каюмова проживает в районе Чоми. Возраст 22 года. Замужем, имеет 1 ребенка. Алкости вместе с мужем ведут семейную деятельность. Они имеют хлебопекарню, где изготавливают и продают национальные лепешки. Алкости по специальности "пекарь". Кредит просит для увеличения товараоборота, т.е. закупа сырья.
texts.en:
Alkosti K. lives in Chomi District. She's 22, married, and has one child. She and her husband have a family business. They have a bakery, where they bake and sell traditional flatbreads. Alkosti is a baker by trade. She plans to use her loan to increase sales buy purchasing ingredients.

Translated from Russian by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy ingredients and increase sales.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Нисолат

texts.ru: Махкамова Нисолат, женщина торгует женской одеждой на Джума и Якшанбе базарах. Товар она закупает в городе Бишкек. Когда Нисолат ездит за товаром в Бишкек ей в бизнесе помогает ее дочка. Она продолжает кредитоваться в нашей организации МЗФ Микроинвест. Ей нравится условия нашей организации. В период кредитования она увеличила свой товарооборот и улучшила финансовое положении семьи.На запрашиваемый займ она хочет закупить летние и осенние платья.

loans.use: На закупку летних платьев.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip B. has been operating a motorcycle transport business in Naivasha town for four years. He is a 28-year-old man, married to Mary Muganda, and they have one child. He heard about KADET through a friend and applied for a first loan, which he has repaid well. He bought a new motorbike for himself with the loan and now he wants to buy another new motorcycle with the help of a second loan. He plans to employ someone to operate it for him. He hopes to grow in the public transport business: creating employment for others and also boosting his income.

About KADET: The Kenya Agency for the Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET) is committed to economically empowering its clients by providing financial services to rural communities in order to relieve suffering and improve living conditions within those communities.

loans.use: To buy a new motorcycle

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph M. has been employed in Naivasha town as a motorcycle operator, ferrying passengers from one point to another, for the last two years. He recently got married to Eunice Wambui. He was introduced to KADET by his friend, and this will be his first loan with KADET. He wants to be self-employed and with the proceeds of this loan, he intends to buy his own motorcycle to operate. His future plan is to buy another motorcycle and employ someone who will run it for him.

About KADET: The Kenya Agency for the Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET) is committed to economically empowering its clients by providing financial services to rural communities in order to relieve suffering and improve living conditions within those communities.

loans.use: To buy his own motorcycle

loans.name: Мухаббат

texts.en: Солиева М 1962 года рождения. Замужем имеет четверых детей. У нее  дома есть вязальная машина. Она на дому вяжет разные детские костюмчики, джемпера, носки. Еще у Солиевой есть дополнительный доход. Ее муж и сын имеют продуктовый магазин в 34 микрорайоне. Она планирует закупить шерстяные нитки и благодарна кредиторам.

loans.use: На закупку шерстяных ниток

loans.name: Муяссар

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 
Мадаминова, женщина торгует на базарах Костокоз, Лохути, Овчи калача платками, скатертями, полотенцами и т.д. Товар она закупает на оптовом рынке города Истаравшана. На запрашиваемый займ она хочет закупить партию банных полотенце и благодарит кредиторов за поддержку.

loans.use: На закупку банных полотенцев.

loans.name: Samuel Muthiora

texts.en:
Samuel lives in Uthiru, Nairobi, where he has put up rental houses. Uthiru area houses a number of low income earners and thus Samuel's tenants live in houses made of iron sheets. He intends to construct better and more secure houses that will provide him with a good income. By renovating his current houses, he will make sure that his tenants are satisfied and comfortable.

Samuel is a 38-year-old single gentleman. He was introduced to KADET by his mother, who is a client but in a different group. He has never borrowed from any other financial institution; however, this will be his third loan from KADET.

About KADET: The Kenya Agency for the Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET) is committed to economically empowering its clients by providing financial services to rural communities in order to relieve suffering and improve living conditions within those communities.

loans.use: To renovate rental houses by installing steel doors, cementing the floor and the front yard

loans.name: Tumwebaze B Mbasagi Jane Group

texts.en:
M. Jane operates a grocery store selling sweet bananas, tomatoes, cabbages, etc. She is 45 years of age, blessed with eight children, of whom four are going to school. She is also taking care of one sibling. She has been in business for over two years. She is using this loan to purchase grocery items to add stock to her business. She is a hardworking business woman whose dream is to educate her children.
M. Jane is the group leader of Tumwebaze B.

loans.use: To purchase grocery items for stock

loans.name: Mariama Diouldé

texts.fr: Mariama diouldé est une femme de 63 ans. Elle est veuve et vit avec ses deux (2) petits enfants dont elle a charge. Elle achète sa marchandise soit, à bord champs auprès des producteurs, soit dans les lieux de collecte d'arachide. Pour la commercialisation, elle va dans les marchés hebdomadaires vendre son produit à des marchandes qui l'acheminent dans d'autres localités du pays. Elle mène cette activité depuis plus de six (6) ans et les profits qu'elle génère lui permettent de prendre en charge les besoins familiaux et assurer la scolarité de ses petits enfants.
texts.en:
Mariama Diouldé is a 63-year-old woman.  She is a widow and lives with her two children whom she supports. She buys her merchandise from producers, be it at the edge of their fields or at places where peanuts are gathered.  To market the merchandise, she goes to weekly marketplaces to sell to merchants, who take it to other towns in the nation.  She has been running this business for over six years, and the profits she generates enable her to meet family needs and to ensure her young children are educated.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To stock large amounts of peanuts and to sell them to retailers at the weekly markets

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: La señora Lidia trabaja tres años con la actividad de la venta de gafas en la Plaza Garita de Lima un lugar muy concurrido en la ciudad de La Paz, vive en la casa de su mamá quien también se dedica a esta actividad, y ambas se ayudan mutuamente para los gastos de la casa, trabaja solamente con nuestra institución y es una cleinte muy puntual, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de gafas deportivas y juveniles y en monturas para lentes de aumento ya que sus clientes le hicieron ese pedido.
texts.en:
For three years, Sra. Lidia has been selling sunglasses at the Plaza Garita de Lima – one of the busiest places in the city of La Paz. She lives at home with her mother, who is also in the same line of work. They help each other with the household expenses.

Only Sra. Lidia is a client of our institution. She is very punctual and has requested a loan to buy sports sunglasses, kids’ sunglasses, and eyeglass frames to increase her supply of merchandise that customers request.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sunglasses & eyeglass frames

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
El señor Mateo T. Villazante Mateo vive en casa propia, en la zona  de Llojeta, ladera oeste de la ciudad de La Paz, con su esposa, la señora Julia Mallku y sus cinco hijos.
El señor Mateo es constructor realizando trabajos en viviendas particulares y su esposa es cocinera, vendiendo almuerzos en la parada de buses de su zona, ingresos con los que mantienen a su familia.
El crédito solicitado es para la construcción de una habitación nueva para su hija que llega para vivir con sus padres.
Esta es la octava vez que solicitan préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado los califican favorablemente y pueden acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Sr. Mateo T. Villazante Mateo lives in his own home in the Llojeta District, located on the west side of the city of La Paz. He and his wife, Sra. Julia Mallku, have 5 children. Sr. Mateo is a builder who constructs private homes and his wife works as a cook. She sells lunches at a local bus stop. They are able to support their family with their incomes.

Sr. Mateo is requesting a loan to build a new house for his daughter, who is currently living with them. This is his 8th loan and his socioeconomic evaluation rated him favorably, which thereby qualifies him for this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Build a home for his daughter

loans.name: Jimy

texts.es:
El señor Jimy V. vive en casa de sus padres, en la zona  de Valle Hermoso, ladera norte de la ciudad de La Paz, con su esposa, la señora Wendy Guzmán y sus dos hijos.
El señor Jimy es prensista y trabaja en una imprenta privada de La Paz y su esposa vende cosméticos de promoción de puerta a puerta, ingresos con los que mantienen a su familia.
Con sus ahorros lograron construir una pequeña vivienda que se encuentra en obra gruesa.
El crédito solicitado es para la conclusión de la construcción de su vivienda y así habitarla.
Esta es la primera vez que solicitan préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado los califican favorablemente y pueden acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Señor Jimy V. lives with his wife, Señora Wendy Guzmán, and their two children in his parents' house in the Valle Hermosa (Beautiful Valley) neighborhood on the north side of the city of La Paz. Jimy is a printer and works for a private printing house in La Paz, while his wife sells promotional cosmetics door-to-door, and with these incomes they support their family. With their savings, they have built a small residence that is still unfinished. The loan they are seeking is to finish the construction of their home so that they can move in. This is the first time that they have sought a loan and the socioeconomic evaluation they completed rates them favorably, which thereby qualifies them for this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To finish construction of his home.

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es:
El señor Pascual M. vive en casa propia, en la zona  de Pasankeri, ladera oeste de la ciudad de La Paz, con su esposa, la señora Guadalupe Condori y sus dos hijos.
El señor Pascual es rentista del magisterio, ingresos mantienen a su familia.
Con anteriores créditos el señor Pascual realizó la construcción de obra gruesa de dos habitaciones que le dará la posibilidad de darles espacio a sus hijos que van creciendo.
El crédito solicitado es para la construcción de la obra fina de dos habitaciones.
Esta es la quinta vez que solicita préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado lo califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Mr. Pascual M. lives in his own home, in the Pasankeri area, west from the city of La Paz. He lives with his wife, Mrs. Guadalupe Condori and two children. Mr. Pascual is retired from the teaching profession and his income supports his entire family. With previous loans, Mr. Pascual was able to complete the rough construction of two rooms, which will provide additional living space for his growing children. The requested loan is for the finish work of these two rooms. This is the fifth time that he has applied for a loan. The socioeconomic research has qualified him, favorably, for access to a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Finish work on the construction of two rooms to better accommodate his children.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
El señor Daniel M.  vive en casa propia, en la zona  de Pasankeri, ladera oeste de la ciudad de La Paz.
El señor Daniel trabaja como obrero en construcciones privadas de La Paz, ingresos con los que se mantiene y a sus dos hijos ya que es viudo.
El crédito solicitado es para la curación de su hijo menor, que sufrió la fractura de su muñeca en un accidente.
Esta es la novena vez que solicita préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado lo califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Mr. Daniel M. lives in his own home, in the Pasankeri area, west of the city of La Paz. He works as a construction worker in private constructions in La Paz. With his income, he supports himself and two children. He is a widower. The requested loan is for the medical care of his youngest son, who suffered a wrist fracture in an accident. This is the ninth time requesting a loan and the the socioeconomic research done indicates that he is qualified to access credit.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: MEDICAL CARE FOR HIS YOUNGEST SON WHO FRACTURED HIS WRIST IN AN ACCIDENT.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La señora Nancy Márquez vive en casa propia, en la zona  de San Pedro, ladera oeste de la ciudad de La Paz, con su hijo.
La señora Nancy es Profesora de primaria, en una unidad fiscal de esta ciudad, con cuyos ingresos  mantiene a su familia.
El crédito solicitado es para la construcción de garaje en su vivienda para alquilarla y así mejorar sus ingresos familiares.
Esta es la primera vez que solicita préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado la califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nancy M. lives in her own home with her son, in the San Pedro area, west of the city of La Paz. Mrs. Nancy is a grammar school teacher for one of the city’s school districts. With her income, she supports her family. The requested loan is for the construction of a garage in her current home. This will allow her to rent it, thereby increasing her household income. This is the first time that she has requested a loan. The socioeconomic research indicates that she is qualified and may access credit.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: The construction of a garage in her home in order to rent it and be able to improve her income

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es:
La señora Albertina C. vive en casa propia, en la zona  de Pasankeri, ladera oeste de la ciudad de La Paz, con sus tres hijos ya que la señora se separo de su esposo.
La señora Albertina trabaja como obrera en una empresa de esta ciudad, ingresos con los que mantienen a su familia.
El crédito solicitado es para la construcción del muro frontal de su vivienda ya que en anterior época de lluvia se desmoronó el muro de adobe que tenia.
Esta es la cuarta vez que solicita préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado la califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Ms. Albertina C. lives in her own home, in the Pasankeri area, west of the city of La Paz. She lives with her three children, since she is separated from her husband. Mrs. Albertina is a worker in one of the city’s businesses. Her income supports her family. The credit requested is for the construction of the front wall of her adobe house. The original wall collapsed, following a rainy season. This is the fourth time that she has requested a loan and the socioeconomic research done, indicates that she is a qualified to access credit.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of the front wall of her house

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Teresa de Jesús, reside en Villa Reconciliación en la capital de Managua, tiene 50 años de edad, se dedica a la costura y venta de ropa desde hace treinta dos años, el cual inicio con ahorro que su esposo dio, reside en Villa Reconciliación en la capital de Managua, sus hijos son tres de 15,24 y27 años de edad, dos estudian y el mayor trabaja, su esposo es comerciante de granos básicos. Sus planes es poder mejorar su vivienda para dar a sus hijos las mayores comodidades. Con este crédito va invertir en la compra de ropa nueva de damas y caballeros para ofertar a sus clientes la variedad.
texts.en:
Doña Teresa de Jesús lives in Villa Reconciliacion, in the capital of Managua. She is 50 years old. She is a seamstress and has been involved in the sale of clothing for thirty two years. She was able to start this with savings given to her by her husband. She has three children who are 15, 24 and 27 years old. Two of them study and the eldest works. Her husband is a merchant of simple grains. She plans on improving her home in order to be able to offer her children the best possible. She will invest the loan in the purchase of new clothing for women and men, offering her clients variety.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Comprar ropa

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: La señora Maria Auxiliadora de 47 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 8 y 18 años que estudian, reside en el barrio Concepción de Maria en la capital de Managua, su negocio es una pulpería que desde hace ocho años logro poner el cual inicio con ayuda de su exmarido.  Con este crédito es su octavo ciclo en Afodenic y da las gracias por los beneficios ya que a través de los prestamos ha logrado poder seguir con su pulpería ya que le ha tocado seguir adelante con la venta ya que su esposo se fue de la casa, lo que mas desea es poder ayudar a sus hijos que estudien. Con este crédito comprara mercadería variada como: granos básicos, carnes, productos lácteos. Ya que son los alimentos diarios de los Nicaragüenses.es la variedad.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Auxiliadora is 47 years old. She is single and has two children, who are 8 and 18 years old. Both children attend school. She resides in the town of Concepcion de Maria, in the capital of Managua. Her business is a convenience store which she started eight years ago with her ex-husband’s help. This loan brings her to her eighth with Afodenic. She is grateful since thanks to these loans she has been able to continue with her convenience store, despite her husband’s leaving the house. Her desire is to help educate her children. With the loan, she will buy an assortment of merchandise, such as, grains, meats and diary products, which are the basic staples of Nicaraguans daily grocery needs.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of grains, meats and dairy products.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Mercedes tiene la edad 43 años, reside en el barrio el Pilar en la capital de Managua, casada y  con un hijo de 18 años que estudia, su negocio es una pulpería que desde hace doce años administra, su esposo trabaja como contador ya que el con sus ahorro le puso la venta. Con esta solicitud quiere comprar mercadería variada para incrementar las ventas con la variedad de productos, como: granos básicos, carnes y frutas. Sus planes es poder obtener más clientela y obtener mejores resultados económicos
texts.en:
Doña Mercedes is 43 years old. She lives in the town of El Pilar, in the capital of Managua. She is married and has an eighteen year old son who is a student. Her business is a convenience store, which she has managed for twelve years. Her husband, who is an accountant, helped her start the business with his savings. With this request, she wants to purchase an assortment of products, such as staple grains, meats and fruits, in order to increase sales. Her goal is to increase her customer base and improve her economic situation.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase staple grains, meats and fruits

loans.name: Lesbia Mayerly

texts.es: La señora Lesbia tiene la edad de 28 años, reside en el bario Laureles Norte en la capital de Managua, casada su esposo trabaja como docente de primaria y es técnico en refrigeración, cual trabaja junto con su esposa, lleva cinco años, inicio con recursos de su salario, tiene tres hijos de 4,9 y 11 años de edad, su meta es poder construir su propia casa, con este crédito va ha legalizar su negocio y así poder tener personería jurídica el cual lograra tener mejor solidez al ofertar sus servicios. Da las gracias ala institución por los beneficios adquirido para su familia y su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Lesbia is 28 years old. She lives in the town of Laureles Norte, in the capital of Managua. She is married and her husband works as a grammar school teacher and a refrigeration technician, as well as, alongside his wife of five years. She has three children who are 4, 9 and 11 years old. Her goal is to be able to build her own house. With this loan she will obtain legal services to legitimize her business, as well as, to create a more solid enterprise. She is grateful to the institution for the benefits provided to her family and business.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to legitimize her business in order to guarantee the services of her business

loans.name: Daysi Dominga

texts.es: Doña Daysi López, tiene la edad de 48 años de edad, reside en el barrio 22 de enero en la capital de Managua,  costurera desde hace veinte años, tiene dos hijos que trabajan en estesa, sus planes es mejorar las condiciones de vida,  inicio con recursos que su esposo dio, con este crédito va comprar ropa y tela para hacer sus vestidos. Da las gracias Afodenic por el préstamo ya que a través de ellos, ha logrado estar estable en la costura y también ha podido lograr cuidar a su esposo que ha estado mal de salud. Su objetivo es poder  comprar otra maquina para crecer en inventario y poder hacer los encargos a menos tiempo.
texts.en:
Doña Daysi López is 48 years old. She lives in the town 22 de Enero, in the capital of Managua. She has been a seamstress for twenty years and has two children who work for Estesa. Her plans are to improve her living conditions. She started with resources, which her husband provided. With this credit, she will purchase clothes and fabric to make dresses. She thanks Afodenic for the loan. Through these loans, she has been able to achieve stability in her work and also take care of her husband who has been in poor health. Her objective is to be able to purchase another machine in order to increase her inventory and be able to fill orders in less time.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of clothing and fabrics to make clothing

loans.name: Roberto Jose

texts.es: El señor Roberto de 38 años de edad, casado y con residencia en los Laureles Sur, en la capital de Managua, su esposa es ama de casa y condos hijos de 11 y12 años que cursan la primaria, sus planes es  poder terminar de construir su casa para una mejor seguridad de su familia, el se dedica ala mecánica textil desde hace nueve años. Este es su tercer ciclo en Afodenic el cual se siente contento de poder trabajar con la institución por que ha logrado hacer mejoras a su vivienda mediante los prestamos. Con este crédito va  comprar dos puertas ya que las que tiene están en mal estado, a si como hace un alero en la casa para cubrirse más de las lluvias. Su meta es poder ayudar a sus hijos a que sean hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Mr. Roberto is 38 years old. He is married and lives in Laureles Sur, capital of Managua. His spouse is a housewife and they have two children of 11 and 12 years of age, who are students. His plan is to be able to finish the construction of their house in order to provide security to the family. Roberto has worked as a textile technician for nine years. This is his third cycle with Afodenic. Dealing with them, has allowed him to make improvements to their home, through loans. With this loan, he will purchase two doors, since the ones he has now are in poor condition. He will also build an awning on the house for better protection from rain. His goal is to be able to help his sons become respectable people.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica Martino, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of two doors and construction of an awning

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: Doña Maria de 36 años de edad, es una ejecutiva de venta de la emprea óptica de Guadalupe de Hondura y el Salvador, tiene tres años laborando en esta empresa, reside en Laureles Norte en la capital de Managua, tiene dos hijos de que estudian, sus planes es poder terminar de construir su casa ya que es muy sencilla, sus paredes son de zinc que esta muy viejo e insegura para su familia y como es madre soltera no ha tenido el apoyo del padre de los niños. Con este crédito comprara materiales de construcción como: piedra, arena, cemento y verjas para hacer la casa e ir poco a poco mejorando. Y lograr tener una casa digna.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria is 36 years old and is an executive in an optical business called “Guadalupe of Honduras and El Salvador”. She has been working in this business for three years. She lives in North Laurel in the capital of Managua. She has three children that study. She plans to finish building her house. She has a simple house with zinc walls that are very old and not very stable for a family. She is a single mother that does not have the support of her children’s father. With this loan she will buy construction materials such as stone, sand, cement and gates to make a house. Little by little things will improve. She would like to have a worthy home.

Translated from Spanish by Esther Levandoski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials so that she can build a concrete home.

loans.name: Secundino Antonio

texts.es: El señor Secundino tiene la edad de 60 años, reside en el barrio Memorial Sandino en la capital de Managua, tiene dos hijos  mayores de edad, los cuales los dos están desempleados y ha sido difícil la situación, para la familia. Su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras esto es para obtener otros ingresos ya que el se desempeña como guarda de seguridad por las noches. Con este crédito quiere comprar materiales de construcción para  levantar las paredes de su cocina y poderla tener aparte y tener mejor comodidad. Da las gracias a la institución por los beneficios alcanzados en la mejora de su vivienda a través de los préstamos.
texts.en:
Mr. Secundino is 60 years old. He lives in the community of “Sandino Memorial” in the capital city of Managua. He has grown children. Two of the children are unemployed and this is a difficult situation for the family. His business is fruit and vegetable sales. He does this as a secondary income. At night he works as a security guard. With this loan he would like to buy construction materials in order to build a wall for his kitchen and separate it from the rest of the house. This would make his home more functional. He gives thanks to the institution that is allowing him to improve his home with this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Esther Levandoski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es: Doña Sandra Maria Guzmán, es una mujer trabajadora que  desde muy joven ha ayudado a su mama a trabajar,  para salir adelante en la alimentación,  su negocio es la venta de cosa de horno, anteriormente planchaba y lavaba ajeno. Tiene 40 años de edad, reside en Lomas del Memorial Sandino en la capital de Managua, su esposo ayuda en los gastos y su hija también la apoya ya que ella trabaja en una casa particular en servicios domésticos. Su meta es poder terminar de construir su casa. Con este préstamo va  a comprar materiales de construcción para  construir el porche de su casa y poder estar en mejores condiciones con su familia ya que todos nos esforzamos por lograr las mejoras. Da las gracias  a la institución por el apoyo a travéz de los préstamos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Sandra is a working woman. From the time she was little, she has helped her mother with her work so that they could have sufficient food. Her business is selling baked goods. Before this she ironed and took in laundry. She is 40 years old and lives in “Lomas del Memorial Sandino” in the capital of Managua. Her husband helps with the expenses and her daughter does also. Her daughter works in a private home as a housekeeper. Her goal is to finish building her house. With this loan she will buy construction materials to be used to build a porch so that her family can live in better conditions. All of us work to better our lives. She is thankful to the institution for their support in providing this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Esther Levandoski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials to build a porch.

loans.name: Hadiyatou

texts.fr: Hadiyatou Baldé est une femme de 52 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de cinq (5) enfants. Elle a une bonne expérience de son activité pour l'avoir pratiqué pendant plus de trois (3) ans. Pour renforcer sa boutique en marchandise, elle sollicite un prêt. Les bénéfices qu'elle réalisera à partir de son activité lui permettront de prendre en charge ses besoins personnels et de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille
texts.en:
Hadiyatou Baldé is a woman, age 52. She is married and the mother of five (5) children. She has good experience in her business having done it for more than three (3) years. To beef up the goods in her shop, she is requesting a loan of 250000 franc CFA which she intends to repay in six months. The profit that she will realise from her business will enable her to meet her personal needs and to support her husband in meeting family expenses.

Translated from French by Cletus Kuunifaa, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To boost her capital and beef up her shop

loans.name: Guissella Ivania

texts.es: La señora Guissela G. de 38 años de edad, reside en el barrio Hialeah en la capital de Managua, casada y con tres hijos de 2, 8 y 13 años de edad, todos estudian para sobre salir adelante con la educación, su esposo esta en los estados unido de América y trabaja de conductor. Su negocio es la venta de ropa y zapatos que inicio con fondos propios para sastifacer,  las necesidades del hogar ya que todo esta caro. Con este préstamo va invertir en la compra de ropa, zapatos y cosméticos para ofrecer variedad a sus clientes y poder obtener mejores utilidades. Su meta es poder ahorrar para darles a sus hijos una buena educación, a si como que su esposo logre regresar y hacer más grande su negocio. Da las gracias Afodenic por el préstamo ya que se ha beneficiado para lograr las ventas propuestas.
texts.en:
Guissela G., 38 years old, lives in the Hialeah neighborhood of the capital city Managua. She is married and has three children, ages 2, 8 and 13, who all are forging ahead with their education. Her husband is in the United States and works as a driver. Guissela's business is selling clothing and shoes, which she started with her own funds in order to meet the needs of her household since everything is expensive. With this loan she is going to invest in the purchase of clothing, shoes and cosmetics to offer a variety to her customers and to be able to obtain better profits. Her goal is to be able to save up enough to give her children a good education and so that her husband can return and make the businesses bigger. She thanks Afodenic for the loan since she has benefitted from it in order to carry out the proposed sales.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Shimmin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy clothes, shoes and cosmetics

loans.name: Kory Tawaco Group

texts.es:
“Kory Tawaco” traducido al castellano significa jóvenes de oro, esta  denominación adopta un grupo de quince personas, que trabajan hace seis años junto a la familia de Pro-Mujer. 
Diferentes son los negocios de este grupo, como ser; venta de cosméticos, elaboración y venta de comida, confección de ropa deportiva, artesanía en tejidos, venta de artículos varios de forma ambulante y otros. La asociación Kory Tawaco desea ampliar sus ventas, para esto necesita de capital para comprar materia prima o insumos (Variedad de cosméticos, papa y verduras, telas y otros dependiendo el caso).
texts.en:
“Kory Tawaco,” which means golden youngsters, is the name of a group of fifteen people, who have worked with the Pro Mujer family for six years. The members of this group pursue different businesses, including selling cosmetics, making and selling food, making athletic clothing, producing weaving handicrafts, selling various products by traveling, and other businesses. The Kory Tawaco group wants to increase its sales, and for this, they need capital to buy raw materials and supplies, including a variety of cosmetics, potatoes and vegetables, fabric, and other items, depending on the business.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raw materials and supplies

loans.name: Tamara Liseth

texts.es: La joven Tamara Colon Ramírez, tiene 20 años de edad,  soltera y con un hijo de siete de meses, reside en el barrio Isaías Gómez en la capital de Managua, su negocio es la venta de fritanga desde hace cuatro años, ella inicio este negocio junto con su mama, este es su segundo ciclo en Afodenic el cual comprara un inodoro para instalarlo en el negocio. Para dar un buen servicio a sus clientes, da las gracias  a la institución por el apoyo con los préstamos ya que se ha beneficiado ya que con el préstamo anterior compro una cocina industrial para su negocio. Su objetivo es poder hacer crecer su negocio y poder mejorar la infraestructura.
texts.en:
Tamara Colon Ramírez is 20 years old, single, and has a 7 month old child. She lives in the Isaías Gómez neighborhood of the capital city of Managua. Tamara has been selling fried snack foods for four years, a business she started with her mother.

She is on her second loan cycle with AFODENIC and would like to install a lavatory in her business. Tamara would like to thank the institution for providing these loans because it has helped her provide better service to her customers. Her last loan was used to build an industrial kitchen for her business. Her goal is to continue growing her business and improving its infrastructure.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Install a lavatory for her business

loans.name: Halimatou

texts.fr: Halimatou B. est femme de 60 ans. Elle est veuve et a la charge de trois (3) petits enfants. Étant une personne handicapée moteur, elle ne peut se déplacer et aller mener ses activités hors du village. Avec ses économies elle a ouvert une boutique à domicile. Ce crédit lui servira à renforcer sa boutique et réaliser de revenus financiers afin de satisfaire ses besoins familiaux et assurer la nourriture des ses petits enfants
texts.en:
Halimatou B. is a 60-year-old woman. She is a widow and supports three(3) little children. Being a physically handicapped person, she cannot get around and run her business outside the village. With her savings, she opened a shop at home. This loan will help her to beef up her shop and make an income in order to meet her family needs and ensure the feeding of her little children.

Translated from French by Cletus Kuunifaa, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To get supplies and beef up her shop

loans.name: Lesbia De Los Angeles

texts.es: La señora Lesbia de los Ángeles tiene la edad de 28 años de edad, reside en un barrio de la capital de Managua Villa Reconciliación, tiene dos hijos que estudian, su esposo se desempeña como electricista, desde hace cinco años administra un comedor que su mama dejo, el cual ha podido mantener y sacar adelante gracias a los prestamos que Afodenic ha dado,  no solo en su negocio, también ha logrado construir su casa, el cual se siente muy sastifecha. Con este crédito es su octavo ciclo el cual va invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción,  como: perlinez y zinc para ponerle el techo y puertas para poder pasarse a su casa. A futuro es hacer mejora al negocio para poder dar un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lesbia de los Ángeles is 28 years old and lives in the Villa Reconciliación neighborhood in the capital city of Managua. She has two children that are students and a husband who works as an electrician. Lesbia has been running a restaurant for five years that her mother left to her. She has been able to keep it going thanks to the loans that Afodenic has given her, not only to help her business but also to help her build a house, which she feels very satisfied with. With this loan, which is her eighth, she is going to invest in construction materials like beams and corrugated iron in order to put up the roof as well as doors to be able to get into her house. In the future she would like to make improvements to her business in order to be able to give good service to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Shimmin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy corrugated iron and beams to be able to put a roof on her house

loans.name: Maritza Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Maritza de 54 años de edad, vende cosméticos el cual tiene un año de vender, inicio con ahorros que su esposo dio, tiene tres hijos mayores  de edad, su esposo es jubilado. Reside en Unidad de Propósitos en la capital de Managua, con este crédito quiere aprovechare las ofertas de Avon ya que vende productos que a los cliente les gusta a si como favorable de pago, sus planes es poder lograr clientela para poder crecer y obtener mejores beneficios.
texts.en:
Maritza is 54 years old and has three children and a husband who is retired. She lives in the Unidad de Propósitos neighborhood in the capital city of Managua. Maritza has been selling cosmetics for one year and started with savings that her husband gave her. With this loan she wants to take advantage of Avon's deals since it sells products that clients like and pays well. Her plan is to gain clientele in order to be able to grow and get better benefits.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Shimmin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cosmetics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Comprar cosmeticos

loans.name: Hortencia Francisca

texts.es: Doña Hortensia Francisca de 62 años de edad, reside en el barrio Camilo Chamorro en la Capital de Managua, su esposo jubilado y con cinco hijos todos trabajan y casados, su negocio es la venta de mercadería variadas, como: cereales, frutas, ropa entre otros, lleva treinta años  en las ventas y da las gracias Afodenic por ayudar a proyectarse en sus objetivos ya que gracias a los prestamos ha logrado la inversión de su negocio es su décimo ciclo en, el cual va a comprar maíz, cacao, para hacer el pinolillo, comprar verduras y ropa para ofertar a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Doña Hortensia Francisca is 62 years old and lives in the Camilo Chamorro neighborhood in the capital city of Managua. Her husband is retired and they have five children, all of whom are married. Doña Hortensia sells all types of merchandise: grain, fruit, clothing, etc. She has been in business for 30 years and thanks AFODENIC for helping her meet her objectives.

Doña Hortensia is on her tenth loan cycle. She will use the funds to buy corn, cacao beans (for making pinolillo ), vegetables, and clothing to offer to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase corn, cacao, vegetables, and clothing

loans.name: Afia

texts.en:
Afia owns and operates a grocery shop and sells items like rice, sugar, vegetable oil, bottled water, body and hair creams, powdered skim milk, etc. in the area where she lives. She is 42 years old, married and the mother of eight children. Currently, all her children are in school.

She deems this a great opportunity to expand her business to include other items frequently requested by her customers. With her ten years of trading experience, she wants to use this loan to buy more bags of rice, bags of sugar, cartons of vegetable oil, boxes of body and hair creams, etc. to increase her inventory. She hopes to improve sales to enable her to save more money for her children's education.

loans.use: To buy more bags of rice, bags of sugar, cartons of vegetable oil, boxes of body and hair creams, etc.

loans.name: Bolivia Group

texts.es:
Dieciocho mujeres deciden conformar la asociación “BOLIVIA” se reúne cada dos semanas en el centro focal Villa Exaltación, a la cabeza de Teodora S. trabajan de forma responsable en sus actividades internas. Diferentes son los negocios de este grupo, como ser; venta de celulares, fruta, ropa, productos de limpieza, comida,  y otros.
La asociación Bolivia  desea ampliar sus ventas, para esto necesita de capital para comprar mercadería, de este modo generar mayores ganancias para el bien de sus familias.
texts.en:
Eighteen women decided to create the association "BOLIVIA" which meets every second week in the hub of Villa Exaltación. The head woman, Teodora S., is responsible for the groups’ internal activities. The group runs a variety businesses, such as selling cell phones, fruit, clothing, cleaning products, food etc. The association Bolivia would like to increase their sales, and for this, they need capital to buy commodities. In this way, they will generate more profit for the well being of their families.

Translated from Spanish by Emma Felten, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es: Doña Juliana de 57 años de edad, reside en el barrio Ayapal en la capital de Managua, casada con dos hijos mayores de edad, su esposo trabaja en servicio de seguridad, ella vende tortilla desde hace veintiún años ha podido captar clientes, y salir adelante con su familia, con este crédito va a comprar materiales de construcción para hacer la cocina y poder estar en mejor condiciones para realizar su trabajo. Da las gracias a la institución por los beneficios alcanzados.
texts.en:
Doña Juliana is 57 years old, married and the mother of two adult children. Her husband is a security guard. She lives in the neighborhood of Ayapal in the capital city of Managua.

Juliana has been selling tortillas for 21 years. She could attract many customers and move forward with her family. She will use this loan to buy building materials to upgrade her kitchen and have better working conditions. Juliana is thankful to the microfinance institution for the loan and her profits.

Translated from Spanish by Robert Mouris, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy building materials to upgrade her kitchen

loans.name: Maria Leonor

texts.es: La señora Maria Leonor de 59 años de edad, reside en Laureles Sur en la capital de Managua, procreo cuatro hijos en su matrimonio, todos casados, doña Maria viuda es una mujer que desde joven trabaja para ayudar a su familia su negocio es la venta de cosa de horno y tiene treinta y cinco años de hacer pues de desde joven comenzó. Sus mayor anhelo es poder terminar su casa, ya que esta en malas condiciones y necesita hacer las paredes de nuevo es por eso, con este préstamo va a comprar materiales de construcción para comenzar a construir su casa. Da las gracias a ala institución por el apoyo a través de los prestamos se ha beneficiado en su vida ya que ha logrado invertir en la venta como mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Maria Leonor, 59 years old, lives in the Laureles Sur neighborhood of the capital city Managua. She has four children who are all married. Maria, a widow, is a woman who has worked to help her family since a young age. Her business is selling baked goods, which she has been doing for 35 years since she began as a young woman. Her greatest desire is to be able to finish her house since it is in bad condition and needs new walls. For this reason, with this loan she is going to buy construction materials to begin to work on her house. She is grateful to the institution for its support through loans. She has benefitted because she has been able to invest in purchases like home improvements.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Shimmin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials to work on her house

loans.name: Yaa

texts.en: Yaa is 46 years old. She is divorced and the mother of three children. Through hard work and self-determination, she has managed to send all her children to school. She is a trader and trades chewing sticks. Chewing sticks are used by many indigenous Ghanaians as a toothbrush and paste. They are very effective in brushing the teeth and contain natural stuff that prevents the teeth from decaying. She takes stock of the sticks from Liberia and supplies them to her loyal customers in the city market of Kumasi in the Ashanti region of Ghana. She deems it a big opportunity to expand her business, as her goods are frequently demanded by customers. With her 30 years of trading experience, she wants to use the loan to buy more sticks so that she can prepare them for chewing.

loans.use: To buy chewing sticks in bulk

loans.name: Akua

texts.en: Akua is 30 years old. She is married and the mother of one child. Currently her child is in school. She sells smoked fish and started her fish sales eight years ago at the community market where she lives. She buys her stock of fish from Cape Coast in the central region of Ghana. She has a customer base that she supplies with fish when she returns from her trek. She sometimes sells some in the city center of Kumasi. She prepares and serves her customers very tasty and good quality fish and because of that, many customers buy from her stand. She requests a loan to upgrade her stock of fish. She dreams of giving her child and the unborn children a quality education through the proceeds from the business. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: To buy more stock of smoked and dried fish.

loans.name: Rolando Jose

texts.es: El señor Rolando José Velásquez , tiene la edad de 40 años , habita en el barrio , La Borgoña , junto a su esposa , la cual trabaja y le apoya con las actividades del hogar , ellos tienen tres hijos a su cargo , los planes hacia un futuro es mejorar las condiciones de vida , don Rolando se desempeña como docentes desde hace 10 años , su sueldo no es lo suficiente para poder comprar materiales de construcción , ya que el desde hace seis ciclo viene trabajando con nuestra institución y ha logrado mejorar gran parte de su vivienda . Con el préstamo va a comprar materiales de construcción y comenzar hacer las mejoras. Da las gracias a la institución por los beneficios alcanzados.
texts.en:
Señor Rolando José Velásquez is 40 years old and lives in the Borgoña neighborhood with his wife who works and helps with the household activities. They have three children whom they support. Their hope for the future is to improve their quality of life. Don Rolando has been a teacher for 10 years. His income is not sufficient to be able to purchase construction materials. This is his sixth loan with our institution. The previous loans have enabled him to improve a large portion of his dwelling. With the loan he will purchase construction materials and begin the remaining home improvements. He gives thanks to the institution for all the support they have given him.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase construction materials to finish construction of his house.

loans.name: Sofía

texts.es: Sofía tiene 39 años, vive con sus hijos: Jean Pierre de 19, Martín de 14 y Ángel de 13 años en su casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de equipos de conversión a gas GNV, los cuales son utilizados para convertir los motores de los carros de gasolina a gas natural, haciéndolos mucho más ecológicos y ahorrativos. Por esta razón, su clientela va en aumento, ya que todos quieren transformar sus vehículos a esta nueva modalidad. Sofía compra estos equipos de una reconocida empresa, la cual le ofrece calidad a un buen precio, es por eso que se siente muy feliz porque sabe que su negocio irá progresando más y más, con la ayuda de sus hijos y poniéndole todo el empeño que la ha traído hasta donde está. Para el futuro quiere establecerse mejor e incursionar en un nuevo negocio, el cual pueda realizar desde su hogar, Sofía está pensando en terminar la construcción de su casa e instalar unas cabinas para brindar servicio de Internet y un centro de llamadas, este sueño lo espera cumplir pronto. Es su tercer préstamo individual con MFP y se siente mejor con este tipo de trabajo, ya que no dispone de mucho tiempo para reunirse con un grupo. Con el dinero solicitado comprará más equipos para la venta y otra parte la invertirá en terminar la construcción de su vivienda para ir acondicionándola para sus cabinas de Internet.
texts.en:
Sofía is 39 years old and lives in her own house with her three sons: Jean Pierre aged 19, Martín aged 14, and Ángel aged 13.

Sofía sells equipment to convert car engines from running on petrol to engines running on natural gas, which makes them much more ecological and economical. For this reason she gets more and more customers, since they all want to transform their cars to this new propulsion system. Sofía buys this equipment from a renowned company, which offers her high quality at a good price. She is very happy because this opportunity allows her business to keep on growing. Her sons help her and their combined efforts have led them to their current situation.

Sofía's plans for the future are to improve her situation and start a new business that she can run from her home. She plans to finish the construction of her house and install a few cubicles in which she will provide Internet services and operate a call center. She hopes to realize this dream soon. This is her third individual loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She prefers this type of loan, as she hasn't much time to meet with a group. Sofía will use her loan partly to buy more equipment for sale and partly to finish the construction of her home and prepare it for her Internet stations.

Translated from Spanish by Robert Mouris, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase her inventory and prepare her house for a new business

loans.name: Freddy Bayardo

texts.es: El señor Freddy Bayardo A. R., tiene la edad de 37 años, habita en el barrio Juan Ramón Padilla, junto a su esposa la cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ellos tienen un hijos a su cargo, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, don Freddy desde hace tres años se dedica al comercio (venta de frutas y verdura) la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es la falta de financiamiento, él inicio esta actividad con esfuerzos propio. Con el préstamo va a incrementar su inventario y diversificarlo. Para mejorar el servicio a su clientela.
texts.en:
Freddy Bayardo A. R. is 37. He lives with his wife in the Juan Ramón Padilla neighborhood. She helps him with the household expenses. They have one dependent child. The family plan is to improve their living conditions. Freddy has been selling fruit and vegetables for three years. The greatest difficulty he has is lack of financing. He started his business through his own efforts. He will use the loan to increase and diversify his inventory. He will do this in order to improve customer service.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Alexander Jose

texts.es: El joven Alexander José López, tiene la edad de 24 años, habita en el barrio, Santiago, ubicado en la concepción, junto a su esposa la cual trabaja y le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ellos tiene a su cargo un niño de un año de edad ; los planes hacia su familia es poder construir su vivienda, ya que donde habitan actualmente es en un cuarto que le dio su mamá, la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es la falta de financiamiento ya que su salario no le ajusta para construir. Con el préstamo va a comprar materiales de construcción y comenzar hacer su casa. Da las gracias Afodenic por darle la oportunidad y lograr su meta en poder tener una casa digna para su familia.
texts.en:
Alexander José López is 24. He lives in the Santiago neighborhood, which is located in Concepción. He lives with his wife. She works and helps with the household expenses. They have a one year old child. The family plan is to be able to build their house. They are currently living in a room that his mother gave him. The greatest difficulty he has is the lack of financing. His salary is not enough for the construction. He will use the loan to buy construction material and start building his house. He is grateful to Afodenic for giving him the opportunity to achieve his goal of being able to have a decent house for his family.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy construction material to start building his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy construction materials to change the roof on her house

loans.name: Yasohara Yesenia

texts.es: La señora Yasohara Yesenia C. A. , tiene la edad de 31 años habita en el Reparto Juan Ramón Padilla , junto a su esposo , él cual trabaja y le apoya con los gastos del hogar , ello tienen una hija de siete años , estudiante de primaria , los planes hacia su familia es mejora las condiciones de vida , doña Yasohara desde hace un año trabaja como domestica en una casa privada , la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es que su sueldo no le ajusta para comprar de una sola vez el material que necesita para terminar de construir su vivienda . Los planes hacia un futuro es poder terminar de construir su casa. Con el préstamo va a comprar materiales de construcción para comenzar a construir ya que tiene una parte comprada y así lograr una vivienda digna para su familia.
texts.en:
Yasohara Yesenia C. A., 31, lives in the Juan Ramón Padilla neighborhood with her husband. He works and helps her with the household expenses. They have a seven year old daughter who goes to elementary school. The family plan is to improve their living conditions. Yasohara has worked as a housekeeper in a private home for one year. The biggest difficulty she faces is that her salary does not allow her to buy all at one time the material needed to finish building her house. Her future plan is to be able to finish building her house. With the loan she will buy construction materials to start building. She has already purchased one part. This way she will have a decent house for her family.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy construction material to start building her house

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es: La joven Juana Maria A. B., tiene la edad de 28 años habita en el sector de los cocos ubicado en la Concepción, junto a su esposo, el trabaja como transportista para ayudarle con los gastos de la casa, ella se desempeña como niñera en la embajada Americana desde hace tres años, ellos tiene una hija de cuatros años, los planes hacia la familia es terminar de construir su casa, doña Juana solicita la cantidad de C$ 5,000.00 ya que los va a  invertir en materiales de construcción para comenzar a construir su vivienda. Da las gracias a la institución por los beneficios para poder mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Juana Maria A. B. is 28. She lives in the area of the coconuts located in Concepción. She lives with her husband. He works as a driver to help her with the household expenses. She has worked as a nanny for three years in the American embassy. They have a four year old daughter. The family plan is to finish building their house. Juana is asking for 5,000 NIO to buy construction materials to start building her house. She is grateful to the institution for the benefit of being able to improve her house.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials to make improvements on her house

loans.name: Carlos Alfonso

texts.es: El señor Carlos Gutiérrez , tiene la edad de 48 años , habita en el barrio, Pablo Calero , ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposa la cual trabaja como comerciante y le apoya con los gastos del hogar , ellos tienen cuatro hijos , ya todos independientes , los planes hacia un futuro es mejorar las condiciones de vida , desde hace 19 años don Carlos de dedica a la agricultura , la mayor dificultad que se le presenta son los problemas ambiéntales , él inicio esta actividad con el apoyo de su papá , los planes hacia futuros hacia su cultivo es diversificarlo y tener una buena producción. Con el préstamo va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos para aplicar a su cultivo y poder lograr una buena cosecha.
texts.en:
Carlos Gutiérrez, 48 years old, lives in the Pablo Calero neighborhood, located in the Ticuantepe municipality. He lives with his wife, who works as a storekeeper and helps with household expenses. They have four children who are already independent. Their future plans are to improve their standard of living. Carlos has been working in agriculture for 19 years. The greatest difficulty that he experiences are the environmental problems. He began this work with support from his father and his future plans are to diversify his crops and have a good production. With the loan he is going to purchase fertilizer and other inputs to apply to his crops in order to be able to have a good harvest.

Translated from Spanish by Josh Wilcox, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase inputs and fertilizer to apply to his crops and achieve a good production

loans.name: Casta Alicia

texts.es: La señora Casta Alicia R. Hernández, tiene la edad de 39 años habita en el barrio Dennis Larios, junto a su esposo el cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ellos no tiene hijos, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, doña Casta desde hace 20 años se dedica a la agricultura, la mayor dificultad que se le presenta son las plagas por falta de insumos, ella inicio esta actividad con el apoyo de su hermano , los planes hacia un futuro es diversificar el cultivo . Con el préstamo va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos y poder aplicar al cultivo para lograr una buena producción y vender a mejor precio en el mercado lo cual lograra sastifacer sus necesidades con las ganancias, da las gracia ala institución por el préstamo ya que ha logrado mejorar el cultivo.
texts.en:
Casta Alicia R. Hernández is 39 years old and lives in the Dennis Larios neighborhood with her husband, who helps pay for household expenses. They do not have any children. Their future plans for the family are to improve their standard of living. Casta has been working in agriculture for 20 years. The greatest difficulty she experiences is the plagues due to the lack of proper treatments. She began this work with support from her brother and their plans for the future are to diversify the crop. With this loan she is going to purchase fertilizer and inputs to apply to the crops to achieve a better production and sell at a better price in the market. This will allow her to satisfy her financial needs with her earnings. She thanks the institution for the loan since it has already helped improve the crop.

Translated from Spanish by Josh Wilcox, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Jose Donald

texts.es: El señor José Donald Pavón C., tiene la edad de 39 años , habita en el barrio Covilaco ubicado en el municipio de la Concepción , junto a su esposa la cual trabaja y le poya con los gastos del hogar , ellos tienen dos hijos una de veinte la cual trabaja y estudia y una adolescente que actualmente estudia y le apoya con las actividades del hogar , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida , don José desde hace 16 años se dedica a la agricultura la mayor dificultad que se le presenta son los  recursos económicos , los planes futuros hacia sus cultivos es hacer renovación y reforestación . Con el préstamo va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos.
texts.en:
José Donald Pavón C. is 39 years old. He lives in the Covilaco neighborhood in the municipality of La Concepción with his wife, who works and helps him with the household expenses. They have two daughters: the older one, who is 20, works and goes to school, while the younger one is a teenager and currently goes to school and helps her family with the household chores. José wants to improve his family’s standard of living. He has made a living in farming for 16 years. The greatest difficulty he has faced is economic resources. His plans for the future involve changing his crops and reforestation on his land. He will use this loan to purchase fertilizer and supplies.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es: La señora Ana Luisa López Pérez tiene la edad de 50 años, habita en el barrio la Ceiba en Nindirí , ubicado en Masaya , junto a su esposo , él cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar , ellos tienen 3 hijos , ya todos independientes , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida y aumentar su negocio , doña Ana desde hace 8 años se dedica a la agricultura la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es la falta de financiamiento , ella inicio esta actividad con el apoyo de su esposo. Con el préstamo va comprar fertilizantes e insumos y poder aplicar el cultivo y mejorar la produccion
texts.en:
Mrs. Ana Luisa L. P. is 50 years old and lives with her husband in the Ceiba neighborhood in Nindiri, located in Masaya. He supports her with the household expenses. They have 3 children who are now all independent. Her plans for her family are to improve their living conditions and increase their business. In the 8 years since Ana has been working in agriculture, the major difficulty has been the lack of financing. She began this activity with the support of her husband. With the loan she will be able to buy and apply fertilizers and other inputs to improve crop production.

Translated from Spanish by Machelle Wilson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Comprar fertilizantes

loans.name: El Fresno De La Soledad Group

texts.es:
La jovencita María Guadalupe vive en una pequeña localidad indígena Mazahua denominada la Soledad de Francisco Serrato en Zitacuaro, Estado de Michoacán,  ella decidió unirse al grupo de crédito el Fresno porque esta formado con personas de su misma comunidad a las cuales ella conoce y respeta mucho, la principal inversión de la mayor parte de los integrantes de este  grupo es en el cultivo de huertos de aguacate Hass donde se desea cultivar nuevas plantas y renovar o nutrir las ya establecidas para que den más fruto y de mejor calidad. 
Guadalupe tiene 19 años, es una chica alegre que apesar de su corta edad tiene muchos sueños y metas, estudio la secundaría  y ya no tuvo la oportunidad de continuar sus estudios por la lejanía de la preparatoria y por el gasto que acudir a algun centro de estudios de educación media superior implicaba para sus padres. 
Desde hace varios años surgió en ella la inquietud de poner un negocio que le permita obtener ingresos económicos.  Su mayor deseo es poner un puesto de comida rápida en la zona  industrial de la Ciudad de Zitacuaro. Ella ha pensado que este lugar es adecuado para emprender su actividad económica porque  trabajo un año ahí  y percibió que los trabajadores buscan lugares cercanos por el poco tiempo con el que cuentan para comer ya que no es suficiente para que se trasladen al centro de Zitacuaro o a sus casas a ingerir sus alimentos.  

Ella tiene pensado utilizar el crédito para comprar una mesa, una sombrilla, platos, vasos, un comal, materia prima  y todo lo necesario para iniciar este negocio de comida. Guadalupe visualiza un negocio rentable, que ofrezca comida limpia, sabrosa y económica a sus comensales que serán principalmente los trabajadores de la zona de fabricas. Además ella desea apoyar a sus padres económicamente para que sus hermanos más pequeños tengan la opción de estudiar y para que su familia mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Guadalupe Sánchez García. Maria Guadalupe is a young woman who lives in a small indigenous Mazahuan town named the Soledad de Francisco Serrato in Zitacuaro, State of Michoacan. She decided to join the Fresno credit group because this group was formed with people from her own community which she knew and respected very much. The main investment of the majority of the members in this group is the cultivation of Hass avocado orchards where they want to cultivate new plants and renew or nourish those already established so that they yield more and better quality fruit. Guadalupe is 19 years old, is a happy girl that in spite of her young age has many dreams and goals. She studied in High School but now does not have the opportunity to continue her studies because of the distance to the school and the expense incurred by her parents of going to an institution of higher learning. It has been several years since she developed an interest in starting a business that would permit her to obtain income. Her main desire is to start a fast food restaurant in the industrial zone of the city of Zitacuaro. She thinks that this is the right place to undertake her business activity because she has worked there for a year and noticed that the workers in the area look for places to eat nearby because they do not have enough time to go to the center of Zitacuaro or to their homes to eat. She has thought of using the credit to buy a table, a parasol, plates, glasses, a cast iron pan for grilling, raw materials and all that is necessary to begin this fast food business. Guadalupe visualizes a profitable business that offers clean, flavorful and economical food to her diners who will be mainly workers in the manufacturing zone. Additionally, she wants to support her parents economically so that her younger brothers have the option to study and so that her family improves their quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Machelle Wilson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Un puesto de comida y se invertira en pequeños huertos de aguacate

loans.name: Bacilia

texts.es:
La señora Bacilia, pertenece al Banco Comunal “La Juleñita”  que esta ubicado en el distrito D. Juli, Provincia D. Chucuito, Departamento D. Puno, ella tiene 60 años D. edad, D. estado civil Casada, tiene 8 hijos (todos con familia) ella es no letrada, vive en el Barrio 3 D. Junio  Jr. Ilave.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 2 años,  con un préstamo inicial D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles,  el cual utilizó para la compra D. combustible (kerosene). 

En este momento ella requiere un préstamo D. S/. 400.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra D. combustible (kerosene) para venderlo por litros, además ella tiene un negocio D. venta D. golosinas.

Su deseo es seguir trabajando.

A ella le gustan los ahorros y la puntualidad en las reuniones.
texts.en:
Señora Bacilia belongs to the La Juleñita Communal Bank which is located in the Juli District, Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 60 years of age, in a civil marriage, and has eight children who all have their own families. She is not literate and lives on Jirón Ilave in Barrio 3 D. Junio. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for two years. She used her initial loan of 300 New Sols to buy fuel (kerosene). At this time she needs a loan of 400 New Sols to buy kerosene fuel in order to sell it by the liter. She also has a business selling sweets. Her wish is to continue working. She enjoys the savings plan and the punctuality in the (Bank) meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy kerosene fuel.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La señora Elsa, pertenece al Banco Comunal “Santa Cruz de Barco”  que esta ubicado en el distrito de Chucuito Sector Barco, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 34 años de edad, estado civil Casada, es madre de 03 hijos y tiene estudios de segundaria completa, vive Chucuito Sector Barco.

Trabaja con el movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 11 años,  con un préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles,  para la compra y venta de pescado. 

En este momento ella requiere un préstamo de S/. 300.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra de pescado para venderlo en el mercado de Puno.

Su deseo es poder formar una empresa de producción de truchas.

A ella le gustan las reuniones y los ahorros.
texts.en:
Elsa belongs to the “Santa Cruz de Barco” communal bank, which is located in the Chucuito Sector Barco district, in Chucuito province in the Department of Puno. She is 34 years old, married, and has 3 children. She completed secondary school, and lives with her family in Chucuito Sector Barco. Elsa has worked with the Manuela Ramos organization for 11 years. Her first loan from them was for 300.00 soles, which she used to purchase and sell fish. At this time she is requesting a loan of 300.00 soles so that she can purchase fish to sell in the market in Puno. Elsa’s goal is to set up a trout farming business. She likes her communal bank because of the meetings and the savings opportunities.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing fish

loans.name: Jose Samuel

texts.es: El señor José Samuel C. C., tiene la edad de 43 años, habita en La concepción, junto a su esposa, la cual le apoya con las actividades del hogar, ellos tiene cuatro hijos ya todos independientes, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, don José desde hace 21 años se dedica a la agricultura y a hacer trabajo de ebanista para poder dar el sustento a su familia, la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es el robo de producción , él inicio esta actividad con el apoyo de sus padres , los planes futuros hacia su cultivo es diversificarlo .Con el préstamo va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos  para aplicar al cultivo y poder obtener una buena cosecha.
texts.en:
José Samuel C. C. is 43. He lives in La Concepción with his wife. She supports him with the household activities. They have four independent children. The family plan is to improve their living conditions. For 21 years José has worked as a farmer and a cabinet maker to be able to support his family. The greatest difficulty he has is theft of his products. He started this activity with help from his parents. His future plan is to diversify his crops. The loan is to buy fertilizers and supplies to apply to his crops to be able to obtain a good harvest.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fertilizers to improve his crops

loans.name: Nancy Carmela

texts.es:
La señora Nancy, pertenece al Banco Comunal “Santa C. de Barco”  que esta ubicado en el distrito de Chucuito Sector Barco, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 34 años de edad, de estado civil Soltera, no tiene hijos, tiene estudios de secundaria completa, vive en Chucuito, Sector Barco.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 6 años,  con un préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual utilizó para la compra de abarrotes. Ahora tiene un criadero de truchas, es el negocio al cual se dedica actualmente..

En este momento ella requiere un préstamo de S/. 200.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra de alimento balanceado para truchas, ella tiene su puesto en el mercado de Puno.

Su deseo es poner una tienda grande para venta de abarrotes y así estabilizarse en un lugar.

A ella le gustan los ahorros y las reuniones.
texts.en:
Señora Nancy is a member of the Santa C. de Barco Community Bank located in the district of Chucuito Sector Barco, Province of Chucuito, Department of Puno. She is 34 years old, unmarried, has no children, and completed her high school studies. She lives in Chuciuto, Sector Barco. She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 6 years. With an initial loan for S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, she was able to purchase groceries. Now she runs a trout nursery. She needs a loan for S/. 200.00 Nuevos soles to purchase balanced nutrients for the trout. She has a stall at the Puno market. Her dream is to have a large store to sell groceries and establish herself in one location. She enjoys cost savings and reunions.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase balanced nutrients for trout.

loans.name: Grismery Yhanett

texts.es:
Grismery es socia del Banco Comunal “30 de Agosto”, en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de El Collao, en el departamento de Puno, ella tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera, y tiene estudios de educación superior vive en Jr. Mollendo.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace casi 1 año, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, monto que le sirvió como capital para adquirir abarrotes.

Actualmente, ella requiere un préstamo adicional de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles,  el préstamo le servirá para poder adquirir fideos, azúcar, arroz, leche, conservas, etc., de esta manera ella podrá obtener mejores ingresos.

Su sueño es tener una bodega y bien surtida.

A ella le gustan las reuniones y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Grismery is a member of the 30 de Agosto Community Bank in the Ilave district, El Collao province, Puno department. She is 22, single, and she has a college education. She lives on Jr. Mollendo. She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was for 500 PEN. She used that money to buy groceries. She currently needs a loan for 1,500 PEN to be able to get noodles, sugar, rice, milk, and canned goods, etc. That way she will be able to get greater income. Her dream is to have a well stocked grocery store. She likes the meetings and the punctuality (of her Community Bank).

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy noodles, sugar, rice, mik, and canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Joffre

texts.en:
Joffre has done laboratory work for dental clinics since 2001 when he moved to the U.S. from Ecuador where he studied orthodontics. One day, one of the clinic doctors told him he would give him some space for his own lab if he worked in his clinic. Joffre immediately took the chance to form new relationships with other clinics and help them do more lab work.

He now has two employees, and he wants to make his lab bigger. Though he hasn’t used other forms of credit before, he heard about ACCION USA’s micro-loans from a friend who was a client. Though he struggled with the decrease in income during the off-season (around December), he is excited to start building his credit with loans from AUSA.

Joffre is using his loan to purchase a new machine that specializes in forming dentures using a special plastic-based material. These dentures are more durable and mold better to the gums. He plans to continue improving his business and watching it grow. As a true craftsman, he loves his job and enjoys seeing the way that his business helps people.

loans.use: To purchase a new machine for forming dentures

loans.name: Maria's Group

texts.es:
La señora Maria, pertenece al Banco Comunal “Santa Cruz de Barco”  que esta ubicado en el distrito de Chucuito Sector Barco, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 55 años de edad, de estado civil casada, y madre de 3 hijos, ella es no letrada, vive en Chucuito Sector Barco.

Trabaja con el movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años,  con un préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual invirtió en su negocio de pesca artesanal. 

En este momento ella requiere un préstamo de S/. 300.00 Nuevos soles, para su negocio de la pesca artesanal, ella dice que comprara redes.

Su deseo es dedicarse a la cría de ganado mayor.

A ella le gustan las reuniones ya que comparte con sus compañeras
texts.en:
Maria belongs to the “Santa Cruz de Barco” communal bank, which is located in the Chucuito Sector Barco district, in Chucuito province in the Department of Puno. She is 55 years old, married, and has 3 children. She is illiterate, and lives with her family in Chucuito Sector Barco. Maria has worked with the Manuela Ramos organization for 3 years. Her first loan from them was for 300.00 soles, which she invested in her traditional fishing business. At this time she is requesting a loan of 300.00 soles for her traditional fishing business; she says that she will use the loan to purchase nets. Her wish is to make a living raising cattle. She likes her communal bank because of the meetings, since she shares with her fellow groups members.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing nets

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: El señor Juan José C. tiene la edad de 65 años,  habita en el barrio Pablo Calero, junto a su esposa la cual le apoya con las actividades del hogar, ellos tiene cinco hijos ya todos independientes, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, don Juan desde hace 40 años se dedica a la agricultura la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es la perdida del cultivo por robo,  los planes futuros hacia su cultivo es diversificarlo. Con el préstamo va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos para mejorar la producción.Da las gracias a la institucion por el prestamo ya que podra mejorar el cultivo
texts.en:
Señor Juan José C. is 65 and lives in the Pablo Calero neighborhood with his wife, who helps him with their home's chores. They have 5 children, who are all independent. Their plans for their family are to improve their living conditions. Juan has practiced agriculture for 40 years. The biggest problem that he faces is the loss of his production to theft. His plans for his crops are to diversify them. With this loan, he will purchase more fertilizers and supplies to improve his production.
